Entries.Introduction: Hmmph... It's irritating to have to meet all these new people, huh?#$b#Name's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}, by the way. Now buzz off... Hmmph.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Welp... that new house blocks my view of the river a little... but it sure looks nicer than that old tin can {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} was livin' in.
Entries.Wed: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}} is my grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Son:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s
Entries.Fri10: You know, I really have been a grumpy old {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} to everyone. But now I feel like I'm softening up like an old ripe fruit. Hehe!$h#$e#Take care, son.^Take care, hun.

Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Son:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} found such a nice husband.^How can two {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Men:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.^I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Men:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} to be together. But you're such a nice young {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PlayerGender}}}}, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.
